biotools.summary: Predict consensus secondary structures for unaligned sequences. Uses a blocked Gibbs sampling algorithm that iteratively samples from the conditional probability distributions P(Structure | Alignment) and P(Alignment | Structure).

bioschemas.name: RNAG
bioschemas.summary: Predict consensus secondary structures for unaligned sequences. Uses a blocked Gibbs sampling algorithm that iteratively samples from the conditional probability distributions P(Structure | Alignment) and P(Alignment | Structure).
